summary: A retexture of the nightingale cuirass, boots and gloves to make them look a little bit more, \'alive\' if you will.
descriptionHtml: A retexture of the nightingale cuirass, boots and gloves to make them look a little bit more, \'alive\' if you will.  This is only male at moment but I am working on the female version and it will hopefully be up by late febuary., early march..  This is my first retexture so I would really appreciate it if you all would give me feedback in the  comments and I will take them into consideration and improve the mod as I see fit on my spare time. Thankyou and enjoy the mod. :) <3
author: funkman36
